gurmukhi: ੴ ਸਤਿਗੁਰ ਪ੍ਰਸਾਦਿ ॥
transliteration: Ikonkaar Satiguru Prasaadi ?
translation: One Onkaar,the primal energy, realized through the grace of divine preceptor

gurmukhi: ੧ ਮੰਗਲਾ ਚਰਨ
transliteration: Ikonkaar Satiguru Prasaadi ?
translation: One Onkaar,the primal energy, realized through the grace of divine preceptor

gurmukhi: ਨਾਰਾੲਿਣ ਨਿਜ ਰੂਪੁ ਧਰਿ ਨਾਥਾ ਨਾਥ ਸਨਾਥ ਕਰਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Naaraain Nij Roopi Dhari Naadaa Naad Sanaad Karaaiaa.
translation: Narayan, the lord of the destitutes, assuming forms has established mastery over all.

gurmukhi: ਨਰਪਤਿ ਨਰਹ ਨਰਿੰਦੁ ਹੈ ਨਿਰੰਕਾਰਿ ਅਾਕਾਰੁ ਬਣਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Narapati Narah Narindu Hai Nirankaari Aakaaru Banaaiaa.
translation: He is the formless king of all men and kings who created various forms.

gurmukhi: ਕਰਤਾ ਪੁਰਖ ਵਖਾਣੀਅੈ ਕਾਰਣੁ ਕਰਣੁ ਬਿਰਦੁ ਬਿਰਦਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Karataa Purakhu Vakhaaneeai Kaaranu Karanu Biradu Biradaaiaa.
translation: As is creator of all the causes He is true to His reputation.

gurmukhi: ਦੇਵੀ ਦੇਵ ਦੇਵਾਧਿ ਦੇਵ ਅਲਖ ਅਭੇਵ ਨ ਅਲਖੁ ਲਖਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Dayvee Dayv Dayvaadhi Dayv Alakh Abhayv N Alakhu Lakhaaiaa.
translation: Gods and goddesses also could not know the extent of that Lord, the imperceptible and beyond all mysteries.

gurmukhi: ਸਤਿ ਰੂਪੁ ਸਤਿਨਾਮੁ ਕਰਿ ਸਤਿਗੁਰ ਨਾਨਕ ਦੇੳੁ ਜਪਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Sati Roopu Sati Naamu Kari Satigur Naanak Dayu Japaaiaa.
translation: The ture Guru Nanak Dev inspired people to remember the true name of the Lord whose form is truth.

gurmukhi: ਧਰਮਸਾਲ ਕਰਤਾਰ ਪੁਰੁ ਸਾਧਸੰਗਤਿ ਸਚਖੰਡ ਵਸਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Dharamasaal Karataar Puru Saadhasangati Sach Khandu Vasaaiaa.
translation: Founding dharamsala, the place for dharma, at Kartarpur, it was inhabited by the holy congregartion as the abode

gurmukhi: ਵਾਹਿਗੁਰੂ ਗੁਰ ਸਬਦੁ ਸੁਣਾੲਿਅਾ ॥੧॥
transliteration: Vaahiguroo Gur Sabadu Sounaaiaa ?1?
translation: Word Wahiguru was imparted (by Guru Nanak) to the people.

gurmukhi: ੨ ਜਗਤ ਗੁਰੂ
translation: Guru of the world

gurmukhi: ਨਿਹਚਲ ਨੀੳੁ ਧਰਾੲੀਓਨੁ ਸਾਧਸੰਗਤਿ ਸਚਖੰਡ ਸਮੇੳੁ
transliteration: Nihachal Neeu Dharaaeeaonu Saadhasangati Sach Khand Samayu.
translation: The steadfast foundation of the abode of truth in the form of holy congregation was laid thoughtfully (by Guru Na-nak Dev)

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਪੰਥੁ ਚਲਾੲਿਓਨੁ ਸੁਖ ਸਾਗਰੁ ਬੇਅੰਤੁ ਅਮੇੳੁ
transliteration: Guramoukhi Pandu Chalaaiaonu Soukh Saagaru Bayantu Amayu.
translation: And he promulgated gurmukh-panth (Sikhism) which is ocean of infinite pleasures.

gurmukhi: ਸਚਿ ਸਬਦਿ ਅਾਰਾਧੀਅੈ ਅਗਮ ਅਗੋਚਰੁ ਅਲਖ ਅਭੇੳੁ
transliteration: Sachi Sabadi Aaraadheeai Agam Agocharu Alakh Abhayu.
translation: There, true word is practised which is unapproachable, imperceptible and mystical.

gurmukhi: ਚਹੁ ਵਰਨਾ ੳੁਪਦੇਸਦਾ ਛਿਅ ਦਰਸਨ ਸਭਿ ਸੇਵਕ ਸੇੳੁ
transliteration: Chahu Varanaan Oupadaysadaa Chhia Darasan Sabhi Sayvak Sayu.
translation: That abode of truth preaches to all the four varnas and all the six philosophies (of Indian origin) remain absorbed in its service.

gurmukhi: ਮਿਠਾ ਬੋਲਣੁ ਨਿਵ ਚਲਣੁ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਭਾੳੁ ਭਗਤਿ ਅਰਥੇੳੁ
transliteration: Mitdaa Bolanu Niv Chalanu Guramoukhi Bhaau Bhagati Aradayu.
translation: Gurmukhs (there) speak sweetly, move humbly and are seekers of devotion.

gurmukhi: ਅਾਦਿ ਪੁਰਖੁ ਅਾਦੇਸੁ ਹੈ ਅਬਿਨਾਸੀ ਅਤਿ ਅਛਲ ਅਛੇੳੁ
transliteration: Aadi Purakhu Aadaysu Hai Abinaasee Ati Achhal Achhayu.
translation: Salutations are due to that primal Lord who is undestructible, undeceivable and unending.

gurmukhi: ਜਗਤੁ ਗੁਰੂ ਗੁਰੁ ਨਾਨਕ ਦੇੳੁ ॥੨॥
transliteration: Jagatu Guroo Guru Naanak Dayu ?2?
translation: Guru Nanak is the enlightener (Guru) of the entire world.

gurmukhi: ੩ ਸੱਚਾ ਪਾਤਸ਼ਾਹ
translation: The true emperor

gurmukhi: ਸਤਿਗੁਰ ਸਚਾ ਪਾਤਿਸਾਹੁ ਬੇਪਰਵਾਹੁ ਅਥਾਹੁ ਸਹਾਬਾ
transliteration: Satigur Sachaa Paatisaahu Bayparavaahu Adaahu Sahaabaa.
translation: The true Guru is the carefree emperor, unfathomable and full of all qualities of a master.

gurmukhi: ਨਾੳੁ ਗਰੀਬ ਨਿਵਾਜੁ ਹੈ ਬੇਮੁਹਤਾਜ ਨ ਮੋਹੁ ਮੁਹਾਬਾ
transliteration: Naau Gareeb Nivaaju Hai Baymuhataaj N Mohu Muhaabaa.
translation: His name is cherisher of the poor; neither He has attachment with any one nor He is dependent on anybody.

gurmukhi: ਬੇਸੁਮਾਰ ਨਿਰੰਕਾਰੁ ਹੈ ਅਲਖ ਅਪਾਰੁ ਅਲਾਹ ਸਿਞਞਞਞਾਬਾ
transliteration: Baysoumaar Nirankaaru Hai Alakh Apaaru Salaah Siaabaa.
translation: Formless, infinite and impeceptible, He is having all the attributes which deseve eulogization

gurmukhi: ਕਾੲਿਮੁ ਦਾੲਿਮੁ ਸਾਹਿਬੀ ਹਾਜਰੁ ਨਾਜਰੁ ਵੇਦ ਕਿਤਾਬਾ
transliteration: Kaaimu Daaimu Saahibee Haajaru Naajaru Vayd Kitaabaa.
translation: The mastery of the true Guru is eternal because all the always present before Him (for His praises).

gurmukhi: ਅਗਮੁ ਅਡੋਲੁ ਅਤੋਲੁ ਹੈ ਤੋਲਣਹਾਰੁ ਨ ਡੰਡੀ ਛਾਬਾ
transliteration: Agamu Adolu Atolu Hai Tolanahaaru N Dandee Chhaabaa.
translation: The true Guru is beyond all measuses; He cannot be weighed on any scale.

gurmukhi: ੲਿਕੁ ਛਤਿ ਰਾਜੁ ਕਮਾਂਵਦਾ ਦੁਸਮਣੁ ਦੂਤੁ ਨ ਸੋਰ ਸਰਾਬਾ
transliteration: Iku Chhati Raaju Kamaanvadaa Dousamanu Dootu N Sor Saraabaa.
translation: Uniform is His kingdom wherein there is no enemy, no friend and no noisy clamour

gurmukhi: ਅਾਦਲੁ ਅਦਲੁ ਚਲਾੲਿਦਾ ਜਾਲਮੁ ਜੁਲਮੁ ਨ ਜੋਰ ਜਰਾਬਾ
transliteration: Aadalu Adalu Chalaaidaa Jaalamu Julamu N Jor Jaraabaa.
translation: The true Guru is judicious; dispenses justice and in His kingdom no atrocity and tyranny is exacted.

gurmukhi: ਜਾਹਰ ਪੀਰ ਜਗਤੁ ਗੁਰੁ ਬਾਬਾ ॥੩॥
transliteration: Jaahar Peer Jagatu Guru Baabaa ?3?
translation: Such a grand Guru (Ndnak) is the manifest spiritual teacher of the whole world.

gurmukhi: ੪ ਸੱਚਾ ਪਾਤਸ਼ਾਹ
translation: The true emperor

gurmukhi: ਗੰਗ ਬਨਾਰਸ ਹਿੰਦੂਅਾ ਮੁਸਲਮਾਣਾਂ ਮਕਾ ਕਾਬਾ
transliteration: Gang Banaaras Hindooaan Mousalamaanaan Makaa Kaabaa.
translation: Hindus adore Ganges and Banaras and Muslims consider Mecca-Kaba as a holy place.But to the accompaniment of mradarig (drum) and rabad (stringed instrument) the praises (of Baba Nanak) are sung

gurmukhi: ਘਰਿ ਘਰਿ ਬਾਬਾ ਗਾਵੀਅੈ ਵਜਨਿ ਤਾਲ ਮ੍ਰਿਦੰਗੁ ਰਬਾਬਾ
transliteration: Ghari Ghari Baabaa Gaaveeai Vajani Taal Mridangu Rabaabaa.
translation: Lover of the devotees, he has come to uplift the down trodden ones.

gurmukhi: ਭਗਤਿ ਵਛਲੁ ਹੋੲਿ ਅਾੲਿਅਾ ਪਤਿਤ ੳੁਧਾਰਣੁ ਅਜਬੁ ਅਜਾਬਾ
transliteration: Bhagati Vachhalu Hoi Aaiaa Patit Udhaaranu Ajabu Ajaabaa.
translation: He himfelf is wonderful (because in spite of his powers he is egoless).

gurmukhi: ਚਾਰਿ ਵਰਨ ੲਿਕ ਵਰਨ ਹੋੲਿ ਸਾਧਸੰਗਤਿ ਮਿਲਿ ਹੋੲਿ ਤਰਾਬਾ
transliteration: Chaari Varan Ik Varan Hoi Saadhasangati Mili Hoi Taraabaa.
translation: By his efforts all the four varnas have become one and now the individual gets liberated in the holy congregatio

gurmukhi: ਚੰਦਨੁ ਵਾਸੁ ਵਣਾਸਪਤਿ ਅਵਲਿ ਦੋਮ ਨ ਸੇਮ ਖਰਾਬਾ
transliteration: Chandanu Vaasu Vanaasapati Avali Dom N Saym Kharaabaa.
translation: Like the fragrant of sandal, he without any discrimination makes every one fragrant.

gurmukhi: ਹੁਕਮੈ ਅੰਦਰਿ ਸਭ ਕੋ ਕੁਦਰਤਿ ਕਿਸ ਦੀ ਕਰੈ ਜਵਾਬਾ
transliteration: Houkamai Andari Sabh Ko Kudarati Kis Dee Karai Javaabaa.
translation: All act as ordained by him and no one has the power to say no to him.

gurmukhi: ਜਾਹਰ ਪੀਰੁ ਜਗਤੁ ਗੁਰ ਬਾਬਾ ॥੪॥
transliteration: Jaahar Peeru Jagatu Gur Baabaa ?4?
translation: Such grand Guru (Nanak) is the manifest spiritual teacher of the whole world.

gurmukhi: ੫ ਗੁਰੂ ਅੰਗਦ ਜੀ ਅਾਗਮਨ
translation: Advent of Guru Angad

gurmukhi: ਅੰਗਹੁ ਅੰਗੁ ੳੁਪਾੲਿਓਨ ਗੰਗਹੁ ਜਾਣੁ ਤਰੰਗ ੳੁਠਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Angahu Angu Oupaaiaonu Gangahu Jaanu Tarangu Outdaaiaa.
translation: Guru Nanak created him ( Guru Angad) from his limbs as the waves are produced by Ganges out of itself.

gurmukhi: ਗਹਿਰ ਗੰਭੀਰ ਗਹੀਰੁ ਗੁਣੁ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਗੁਰੁ ਗੋਬਿੰਦੁ ਸਦਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Gahir Ganbheeru Gaheeru Gounu Guramoukhi Guru Gobindu Sadaaiaa.
translation: Embodied with deep and sublime attributes he (Angad) was known by gurmukhs as the form of the (imperceptible) supreme soul (paramatman).

gurmukhi: ਦੁਖ ਸੁਖ ਦਾਤਾ ਦੇਣਿਹਾਰੁ ਦੁਖ ਸੁਖ ਸਮਸਰਿ ਲੇਪੁ ਨਾ ਲਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Doukh Soukh Daataa Daynihaaru Doukh Soukh Samasari Laypu N Laaiaa.
translation: He himself is bestower of pleasures and pains but remains always without any blot.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰ ਚੇਲਾ ਚੇਲਾ ਗੁਰੂ ਗੁਰੁ ਚੇਲੇ ਪਰਚਾ ਪਰਚਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Gur Chaylaa Chaylaa Guroo Guru Chaylay Parachaa Parachaaiaa.
translation: The love between the Guru and the disciple was such that the disciple became Guru and the Guru disciple.

gurmukhi: ਬਿਰਖਹੁ ਫਲੁ ਫਲ ਤੇ ਬਿਰਖੁ ਪਿੳੁ ਪੁਤਹੁ ਪੁਤੁ ਪਿੳੁ ਪਤੀਅਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Birakhahu Phalu Phal Tay Birakhu Piu Poutahu Poutu Piu Pateeaaiaa.
translation: It happened in the same manner as tree creates fruit and from fruit is created tree, or as father becomes happy over son and son feels happy in obeying the orders of father.

gurmukhi: ਪਾਰਬ੍ਹਮ ਪੂਰਨੁ ਬ੍ਹਮੁ ਸਬਦੁ ਸੁਰਤਿ ਲਿਵ ਅਲਖ ਲਖਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Paarabrahamu Pooranu Brahamu Sabadu Surati Liv Alakh Lakhaaiaa.
translation: His consiconsness merged into word and the perfect transcendental Brahm made him see the imperceptible (Lord).

gurmukhi: ਬਾਬਾਣੇ ਗੁਰ ਅੰਗਦੁ ਅਾੲਿਅਾ ॥੫॥
transliteration: Baabaanay Gur Angad Aaiaa ?5?
translation: Now Guru Angad got established as ( the extended form of) Baba Nanak.

gurmukhi: ੬ ਗੁਰੂ ਅੰਗਦ ਪ੍ਰਕਾਸ਼
translation: Induction of Guru Angad

gurmukhi: ਪਾਰਸੁ ਹੋਅਾ ਪਾਰਸਹੁ ਸਤਿਗੁਰ ਪਰਚੇ ਸਤਿਗੁਰ ਕਹਣਾ
transliteration: Paarasu Hoaa Paarasahu Satigur Parachay Satiguru Kahanaa.
translation: Meeting paras (the philosopher's stone Guru Nanak) Guru Angad became paras himself and because of his love for the Guru he was called the true Guru.

gurmukhi: ਚੰਦਨੁ ਹੋੲਿਅਾ ਚੰਦਨਹੁ ਗੁਰ ੳੁਪਦੇਸ ਰਹਤਿ ਵਿਚਿ ਰਹਣਾ
transliteration: Chandanu Hoiaa Chandanahu Gur Oupadays Rahat Vichi Rahanaa.
translation: Living according to the preachings and code of conduct laid down by the Guru, he became sandal by meeting the sandal (Guru Nanak).

gurmukhi: ਜੋਤਿ ਸਮਾਣੀ ਜੋਤਿ ਵਿਚਿ ਗੁਰਮਤਿ ਸੁਖੁ ਦੁਰਮਤਿ ਦੁਖ ਦਹਣਾ
transliteration: Joti Samaanee Joti Vichi Guramati Soukhu Duramati Doukh Dahanaa.
translation: The light immersed in the light; the delight of the wisdom of Guru (gurmat) was attained and the sufferings of evil mindedness got burnt and wiped out.

gurmukhi: ਅਚਰਜ ਨੋ ਅਚਰਜੁ ਮਿਲੈ ਵਿਸਮਾਦੈ ਵਿਸਮਾਦੁ ਸਮਹਣਾ
transliteration: Acharaj No Acharaju Milai Visamaadai Visamaadu Samahanaa.
translation: The wonder met the wonder and becoming wondrous got imbued with the wonder (Guru Nanak).

gurmukhi: ਅਪਿੳੁ ਪੀਅਣ ਨਿਝਰੁ ਝਰਣੁ ਅਜਰੁ ਜਰਣੁ ਅਸਹੀਅਣੁ ਸਹਣਾ
transliteration: Apiu Peean Nijharu Jharanu Ajaru Jaranu Asaheeanu Sahanaa.
translation: After quaffing the nectar the fountain of joy emerges to flew and then the power of bearing the unbearable is obtained

gurmukhi: ਸਚੁ ਸਮਾਣਾ ਸਚੁ ਵਿਚਿ ਗਾਡੀ ਰਾਹੁ ਸਾਧਸੰਗਿ ਵਹਣਾ
transliteration: Sachu Samaanaa Sachu Vichi Gaadee Raahu Saadhasangi Vahanaa.
translation: Moving on the highway of the holy congregation, the truth has merged into the truth.

gurmukhi: ਬਾਬਾਣੈ ਘਰਿ ਚਾਨਣੁ ਲਹਣਾ ॥੬॥
transliteration: Baabaanai Ghari Chaananu Lahanaa ?6?
translation: In fact Lahana became the light of Baba Nanak's house.

gurmukhi: ੭ ਗੁਰ ਅੰਗਦ ਸਪੁਤ੍ਰ
translation: The worthy son Guru Angad

gurmukhi: ਸਬਦੈ ਸਬਦੁ ਮਿਲਾੲਿਅਾ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਅਘੜੁ ਘੜਾੲੇ ਗਹਣਾ
transliteration: Sabadai Sabadu Milaaiaa Guramoukhi Agharhu Gharhaaay Gahanaa.
translation: Gurumukh (Angad) attuning his sabad (word) to the Sabad has chiselled his clumsy mind to make it an ornament.

gurmukhi: ਭਾੲਿ ਭਗਤਿ ਭੈ ਚਲਣਾ ਅਾਪੁ ਗਣਾੲਿ ਨ ਖਲਹਲੁ ਖਹਣਾ
transliteration: Bhaai Bhagati Bhai Chalanaa Aapu Ganaai N Khalahalu Khahanaa.
translation: He has disciplined himself in the fear of loving devotion and losing the sense of ego has saved himself from all sorts of imbroglios.

gurmukhi: ਦੀਨ ਦੁਨੀ ਦੀ ਸਾਹਿਬੀ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਗੋਸ ਨਸੀਨੀ ਬਹਣਾ
transliteration: Deen Dounee Dee Saahibee Guramoukhi Gos Naseenee Bahanaa.
translation: Achieving mastery over spirituality as well as temporarily, the gurmukh has resided in the loneliness.

gurmukhi: ਕਾਰਣ ਕਰਣ ਸਮਰਥ ਹੈ ਹੋੲਿ ਅਛਲੁ ਛਲ ਅੰਦਰਿ ਛਹਣਾ
transliteration: Kaaran Karan Samarad Hai Hoi Achhalu Chhal Andari Chhahanaa.
translation: Even being cause of all effects and all powerfull he remains in the world full of deceptions.

gurmukhi: ਸਤੁ ਸੰਤੋਖੁ ਦੲਿਅਾ ਧਰਮ ਅਰਥ ਵੀਚਾਰਿ ਸਹਜਿ ਘਰਿ ਘਹਣਾ
transliteration: Satu Santokhu Daiaa Dharam Arad Veechaari Sahaji Ghari Ghahanaa.
translation: Dopting truth, contentment, compassion dharma, richness and scriminatory wisdom(Vichar) he has made peace his abo

gurmukhi: ਕਾਮ ਕ੍ਰੋਧੁ ਵਿਰੋਧੁ ਛਡਿ ਲੋਭ ਮੋਹੁ ਅਹੰਕਾਰਹੁ ਤਹਣਾ
transliteration: Kaam Krodhu Virodhu Chhadi Lobh Mohu Ahankaarahu Tahanaa.
translation: Shedding lust, anger and opposition he has repudiated greed, infatuation and ego.

gurmukhi: ਪੁਤੁ ਸਪੁਤੁ ਬਬਾਣੇ ਲਹਣਾ ॥੭॥
transliteration: Poutu Sapoutu Babaanay Lahanaa ?7?
translation: Such a worthy son Lahana (Angad) is born in the family of Baba (Nanak).

gurmukhi: ੮ ਗੁਰ ਅੰਗਦ ਸਪੁਤ੍ਰ
translation: Worthy son, Guru Angad

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰ ਅੰਗਦੁ ਗੁਰੁ ਅੰਗੁ ਤੇ ਅੰਮ੍ਰਿਤ ਬਿਰਖੁ ਅੰਮ੍ਰਿਤ ਫਲ ਫਲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Guru Angad Guru Ang Tay Anmrit Birakhu Anmrit Phal Phaliaa.
translation: From the limb of Guru (Nanak) the tree of nector fruits in the name of Guru Angad has flourished.

gurmukhi: ਜੋਤੀ ਜੋਤਿ ਜਗਾੲੀਅਨੁ ਦੀਵੇ ਤੇ ਜਿੳੁ ਦੀਵਾ ਬਲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Jotee Joti Jagaaeeanu Deevay Tay Jiu Deevaa Baliaa.
translation: As a lamp lits another lamp, with the light (of Guru Nanak), the flame (of Guru Angad) has been lit.

gurmukhi: ਹੀਰੈ ਹੀਰਾ ਬੇਧਿਅਾ ਛਲੁ ਕਰਿ ਅਛਲੀ ਅਛਲੁ ਛਲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Heerai Heeraa Baydhiaa Chhalu Kari Achhulee Achhalu Chhaliaa.
translation: The diamond has cut (to shape) the diamond as if through magic, the undeceivable (Baba Nanak) has brought under control the simple_minded one (Guru Angad)

gurmukhi: ਕੋੲੀ ਬੁਝਿ ਨ ਹੰਘੲੀ ਪਾਣੀ ਅੰਦਰਿ ਪਾਣੀ ਰਲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Koi Bujhi N Hanghaee Paanee Andari Paanee Raliaa.
translation: Now they connot be distinguished as if water has mingled with water.

gurmukhi: ਸਚਾ ਸਚੁ ਸੁਹਾਵੜਾ ਸਚੁ ਅੰਦਰਿ ਸਚੁ ਸਚਹੁ ਢਲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Sachaa Sachu Suhaavarhaa Sachu Andari Sachu Sachahu Dphaliaa.
translation: The Truth is always beautiful and in the die of truth he (Guru Angad) has moulded himself.

gurmukhi: ਨਿਹਚਲੁ ਸਚਾ ਤਖਤੁ ਹੈ ਅਬਿਚਲ ਰਾਜ ਨ ਹਲੈ ਹਲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Nihachalu Sachaa Takhatu Hai Abichal Raaj N Halai Haliaa.
translation: His throne is immovable and kingdom everlasting ; they connot be moved in spite of efforts.

gurmukhi: ਸਚ ਸਬਦੁ ਗੁਰਿ ਸੳੁਪਿਅਾ ਸਚ ਟਕਸਾਲਹੁ ਸਿਕਾ ਚਲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Sach Sabadu Guri Saoupiaa Sach Takasaalahu Sikaa Chaliaa.
translation: The ture word has been handed over ( to Guru Angad) by the Guru (Nanak) as if the coin has been issued from the mint

gurmukhi: ਸਿਧ ਨਾਥ ਅਵਤਾਰ ਸਭ ਹਥ ਜੋੜਿਕੈ ਹੋੲੇ ਖਲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Sidh Naad Avataar Sabh Had Jorhi Kai Hoay Khaliaa.
translation: Now siddhs naths and incarnations (of gods) etc have stood before him with folded hands

gurmukhi: ਸਚਾ ਹੁਕਮੁ ਸੁ ਅਟਲੁ ਨ ਟਲਿਅਾ ॥੮॥
transliteration: Sachaa Houkamu Su Atalu N Taliaa ?8?
translation: And this command is true,immutable and inevitable.

gurmukhi: ੯ ਗੁਰੂ ਅਮਰਦਾਸ
translation: Guru Amar Das

gurmukhi: ਅਛਲੁ ਅਛੇਦੁ ਅਭੇਦੁ ਹੈ ਭਗਤਿ ਵਛਲ ਹੋੲਿ ਅਛਲੁ ਛਲਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Achhalu Achhaydu Abhaydu Hai Bhagati Vachhal Hoi Achhal Chhalaaiaa.
translation: The Lord is undeceivable, indestructible and non-dual, but because of His love for His devotees He is sometimes deluded by them (as in the case of 'Guru Amar Das).

gurmukhi: ਮਹਿਮਾ ਮਿਤਿ ਮਿਰਜਾਦ ਲੰਘਿ ਪਰਮਿਤਿ ਪਾਰਾਵਾਰੁ ਨ ਪਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Mahimaa Miti Mirajaad Laghi Paramiti Paaraavaaru N Paaiaa.
translation: His grandeur has crossed all the limits and being boyond all the boundaries none could know about his extent.

gurmukhi: ਰਹਰਾਸੀ ਰਹਰਾਸਿ ਹੈ ਪੈਰੀ ਪੈ ਜਗੁ ਪੈਰੀ ਪਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Raharaasee Raharaasi Hai Pairee Pai Jagu Pairee Paaiaa.
translation: Among all the codes of couduct, the code of conduct of the Guru is the best one; he falling at the feet of Guru (Angad) has made the whole world bow at his own feet.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਸੁਖਫਲੁ ਅਮਰ ਪਦੁ ਅੰਮ੍ਰਿਤ ਬ੍ਰਿਖਿ ਅੰਮ੍ਰਿਤ ਫਲ ਲਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Guramoukhi Soukh Phalu Amarapadu Anmrit Brikhi Anmrit Phal Laaiaa.
translation: The pleasure fruit of the gurmuldts is the state of immortality and on the tree of nectar (Guru Angad) Guru Amar Das, the nectar fruit has grown.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰ ਚੇਲਾ ਚੇਲਾ ਗੁਰੂ ਪੁਰਖਹੁ ਪੁਰਖ ੳੁਪਾੲਿ ਸਮਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Gur Chaylaa Chaylaa Guroo Purakhahu Purakh Oupaai Samaaiaa.
translation: From the Guru emerged the disciple and the disciple became the Guru.

gurmukhi: ਵਰਤਮਾਨ ਵੀਹਿ ਵਿਸਵੇ ਹੋੲਿ ੲਿਕੀਹ ਸਹਜਿ ਘਰਿ ਅਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Varatamaan Veehi Visavay Hoi Ikeeh Sahaji Ghari Aaiaa.
translation: Guru Angad the Cosmic spirit ( Purakh) having manifested the supreme spirit, (Guru Amar Das), himself merged in the supreme light.

gurmukhi: ਸਚਾ ਅਮਰੁ ਅਮਰਿ ਵਰਤਾੲਿਅਾ ॥੯॥
transliteration: Sachaa Amaru Amari Varataaiaa ?9?
translation: Going beyond the perceptible world, he established himself in equipoise.Thus, Guru Amar Das has spead the true message.

gurmukhi: ੧੦ ਗੁਰੂ ਅਮਰਦਾਸ
translation: Amar Das,the Grandson of Guru Nanak

gurmukhi: ਸਬਦੁ ਸੁਰਤਿ ਪਰਚਾੲਿਕੈ ਚੇਲੇ ਤੇ ਗੁਰੁ ਗੁਰੁ ਤੇ ਚੇਲਾ
transliteration: Sabadu Surati Parachaai Kai Chaylay Tay Guru Guru Tay Chaylaa.
translation: Absorbing consciousness in the Word, the disciple became Guru and the Guru disciple.

gurmukhi: ਵਾਣਾ ਤਾਣਾ ਅਾਖੀਅੈ ਸੂਤੁ ੲਿਕੁ ਹੁੲਿ ਕਪੜੁ ਮੇਲਾ
transliteration: Vaanaa Taanaa Aakheeai Sootu Iku Hui Kaparhu Maylaa.
translation: Ward and weft are separate names but in the form of yam they are one and are known as the one, cloth.

gurmukhi: ਦੁਧਹੁ ਦਹੀ ਵਖਾਣੀਅੈ ਦਹੀਅਹੁ ਮਖਣੁ ਕਾਜੁ ਸੁਹੇਲਾ
transliteration: Dudhahu Dahee Vakhaaneeai Daheeahu Makhanu Kaaju Suhaylaa.
translation: The same milk becomes curd and from curd is made butter to be used variously.

gurmukhi: ਮਿਸਰੀ ਖੰਡੁ ਵਖਾਣੀਅੈ ਜਾਣੁ ਕਮਾਦਹੁ ਰੇਲਾ ਪੇਲਾ
transliteration: Misaree Khandu Vakhaaneeai Jaanu Kamaadahu Raylaa Paylaa.
translation: From the sugar cane juice are prepared the lump sugar and other forms of sugar.

gurmukhi: ਖੀਰਿ ਖੰਡੁ ਘਿੳੁ ਮੇਲਿ ਕਰਿ ਅਤਿ ਵਿਸਮਾਦੁ ਸਾਦ ਰਸ ਕੇਲਾ
transliteration: Kheeri Khandu Ghiu Mayli Kari Ati Visamaadu Saad Ras Kaylaa.
translation: Mixing the milk, sugar, ghee etc. many dainty dishes are prepared.

gurmukhi: ਪਾਨ ਸੁਪਾਰੀ ਕਥੁ ਮਿਲਿ ਚੂਨੇ ਰੰਗੁ ਸੁਰੰਗ ਸੁਹੇਲਾ
transliteration: Paan Soupaaree Kadu Mili Choonay Rangu Surang Suhaylaa.
translation: Likewise when betal, betel nut, catechu and lime are mixed, they produce a beautiful colour.

gurmukhi: ਪੋਤਾ ਪਰਵਾਣੀਕੁ ਨਵੇਲਾ ॥੧੦॥
transliteration: Potaa Paravaaneeku Navaylaa ?10?
translation: In the same way the grandson Guru Amar Das has been authentically established.

gurmukhi: ੧੧ ਗੁਰੂ ਅਮਰ ਦਾਸ
translation: Guru Amar Das

gurmukhi: ਤਿਲਿ ਮਿਲਿ ਫੁਲ ਅਮੁਲ ਜਿੳੁ ਗੁਰਸਿਖ ਸੰਧਿ ਸੁਗੰਧ ਫੁਲੇਲਾ
transliteration: Tili Mili Phul Amul Jiu Gurasikh Sandhi Sougandh Phulaylaa.
translation: As sesame mixed with flower becomes scented oil, likewise the, meeting of the Guru and the disciple makes a new personality.

gurmukhi: ਖਾਸਾ ਮਲਮਲਿ ਸਿਰੀਸਾਫੁ ਸਾਹ ਕਪਾਹ ਚਲਤ ਬਹੁ ਖੇਲਾ
transliteration: Khaasaa Malamali Sireesaadhu Saah Kapaah Chalat Bahu Khaylaa.
translation: Cotten also after passing ugh many processes becomes cloth of different varieties (similarly the ciple after meeting the Gum obtains a high position) .

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰ ਮੂਰਤਿ ਗੁਰੁ ਸਬਦੁ ਹੈ ਸਾਧਸੰਗਤਿ ਮਿਲਿ ਅੰਮ੍ਰਿਤ ਵੇਲਾ
transliteration: Gur Moorati Gur Sabadu Hai Saadhasangati Mili Anmrit Vaylaa.
translation: Only the Guru's rd is the idol of Guru and this word is received in the holy congregation e ambrosial hours of the day.

gurmukhi: ਦੁਨੀਅਾ ਕੂੜੀ ਸਾਹਿਬੀ ਸਚ ਮਣੀ ਸਚ ਗਰਬਿ ਗਹੇਲਾ
transliteration: Douneeaa Koorhee Saahibee Sach Manee Sach Garabi Gahaylaa.
translation: The lordship of the world is false and truth must be caught hold of proudly.

gurmukhi: ਦੇਵੀ ਦੇਵ ਦੁੜਾੲਿਅਨੁ ਜਿੳੁ ਮਿਰਗਾਵਲਿ ਦੇਖਿ ਬਘੇਲਾ
transliteration: Dayvee Dayv Durhaaianu Jiu Miragaavali Daykhi Baghaylaa.
translation: Before such a truthful person, gods and goddesses run as a group of deer take to their heels on seeing a tiger

gurmukhi: ਹੁਕਮਿ ਰਜਾੲੀ ਚਲਣਾ ਪਿਛੇ ਲਗੇ ਨਕਿ ਨਕੇਲਾ
transliteration: Houkami Rajaaee Chalanaa Pichhay Lagay Naki Nakaylaa.
translation: People, accepting the will of the lord and wearing the nose bar (of love) move (calmly) with Guru Amar Das.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਸਚਾ ਅਮਰਿ ਸੁਹੇਲਾ ॥੧੧॥
transliteration: Guramoukhi Sachaa Amari Suhaylaa ?11?
translation: Guru Amar Das is the truth mate, blest one gurmukh, the Guru oriented.

gurmukhi: ੧੨ ਗੁਰੂ ਅਮਰਦੇਵ
translation: Guru Amar Das

gurmukhi: ਸਤਿਗੁਰ ਹੋਅਾ ਸਤਿਗੁਰਹੁ ਅਚਰਜੁ ਅਮਰ ਅਮਰਿ ਵਰਤਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Satigur Hoaa Satigurahu Acharaju Amar Amari Varataaiaa.
translation: From the true Guru (Angad Dev) becoming the truthful Guru, Amar

gurmukhi: ਸੋ ਟਿਕਾ ਸੋ ਬੈਹਣਾ ਸੋੲੀ ਸਚਾ ਹੁਕਮੁ ਚਲਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: So Tikaa So Baihanaa Soee Sachaa Houkamu Chalaaiaa.
translation: Has enacted a wondrous feat. The same light, the same seat and the same will of Lord is being spread by him.

gurmukhi: ਖੋਲਿ ਖਜਾਨਾ ਸਬਦੁ ਦਾ ਸਾਧਸੰਗਤਿ ਸਚੁ ਮੇਲਿ ਮਿਲਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Kholi Khajaanaa Sabadu Daa Saadhasangati Sachu Mayli Milaaiaa.
translation: He has opened up the storehouse of word and has made the truth manifest through the holy congregation.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰ ਚੇਲਾ ਪਰਵਾਣੁ ਕਰਿ ਚਾਰਿ ਵਰਨ ਲੈ ਪੈਰੀ ਪਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Gur Chaylaa Paravaanu Kari Chaari Varan Lai Pairee Paaiaa.
translation: Making the disciple authentic, the Guru has put all the four varnas at his feet.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ੲਿਕੁ ਧਿਅਾੲੀਅੈ ਦੁਰਮਤਿ ਦੂਜਾ ਭਾੳੁ ਮਿਟਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Guramoukhi Iku Dhiaaeeai Duramati Doojaa Bhaau Mitaaiaa.
translation: Now all becoming gurmukhs adore the one Lord and evil wisdom and duality have been wiped out of them.

gurmukhi: ਕੁਲਾ ਧਰਮ ਗੁਰਸਿਖ ਸਭ ਮਾੲਿਅਾ ਵਿਚਿ ੳੁਦਾਸੁ ਰਹਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Kulaa Dharam Gurasikh Sabh Maaiaa Vichi Udaasu Rahaaiaa.
translation: Now the duty of the family and the teaching of the Guru is that one should be detacthed while living amidst maya

gurmukhi: ਪੂਰੇ ਪੂਰਾ ਥਾਟ ਬਣਾੲਿਅਾ ॥੧੨॥
transliteration: Pooray Pooraa Daatu Banaaiaa ?12?
translation: The perfect Guru has created the perfect grandeur.

gurmukhi: ੧੩ ਗੁਰੂ ਅਮਰਦਾਸ
translation: Guru Amar Das

gurmukhi: ਅਾਦਿ ਪੁਰਖੁ ਅਾਦੇਸੁ ਕਰਿ ਅਾਦਿ ਜੁਗਾਦਿ ਸਬਦ ਵਰਤਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Aadi Purakhu Aadaysu Kari Aadi Jougaadi Sabad Varataaiaa.
translation: Having worshipped the primal Lord he made the word pervade all the yugs ,and even before the yugs i.e. before the advent of time

gurmukhi: ਨਾਮੁ ਦਾਨੁ ੲਿਸਨਾਨੁ ਦਿੜੁ ਗੁਰੁ ਸਿਖ ਦੇ ਸੈਂਸਾਰੁ ਤਰਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Naamu Daanu Isanaanu Dirhu Guru Sikh Day Sainsaaru Taraaiaa.
translation: Instructing people and teaching about the remembrance of nam (Lord), charity and ablutions, the Guru has taken them across the world(ocean)

gurmukhi: ਕਲੀਕਾਲ ੲਿਕ ਪੈਰ ਹੁੲਿ ਚਾਰ ਚਰਨ ਕਰਿ ਧਰਮੁ ਧਰਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Kaleekaal Ik Pair Hui Chaar Charan Kari Dharamu Dharaaiaa.
translation: The Guru provided dour legs to dharma which had remained one legged earlier.

gurmukhi: ਭਲਾ ਭਲਾ ਭਲਿਅਾੲੀਅਹੁ ਪਿੳੁ ਦਾਦੇ ਦਾ ਰਾਹੁ ਚਲਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Bhalaa Bhalaa Bhaliaaeeahu Piu Daaday Daa Raahu Chalaaiaa.
translation: From the point of view of public weal this was good and this way he further extended the ,,way shown by his (spiritual)father and grandfather.

gurmukhi: ਅਗਮ ਅਗੋਚਰ ਗਹਣਗਤਿ ਸਬਦ ਸੁਰਤਿ ਲਿਵ ਅਲਖੁ ਲਖਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Agam Agochar Gahan Gati Sabad Surati Liv Alakhu Lakhaaiaa.
translation: Teaching the skill of merging the cousciousness in the word, he has brought people face to face with that imperceptible (Lord)

gurmukhi: ਅਪਰੰਪਰ ਅਾਗਾਧਿ ਬੋਧਿ ਪਰਮਿਤਿ ਪਾਰਾਵਾਰ ਨ ਪਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Aparanpar Aagaadhi Bodhi Paramiti Paaraavaar N Paaiaa.
translation: His glory is unapproachable, invisible and deep; its limits cannot be known.

gurmukhi: ਅਾਪੇ ਅਾਪਿ ਨ ਅਾਪੁ ਜਣਾੲਿਅਾ ॥੧੩॥
transliteration: Aapay Aapi N Aapu Janaaiaa ?13?
translation: He has known his real self but even then he has never attributed any importance to himself.

gurmukhi: ੧੪ ਗੁਰੂ ਅਮਰਦਾਸ
translation: Guru Ram Das

gurmukhi: ਰਾਗ ਦੋਖ ਨਿਰਦੋਖ ਹੈ ਰਾਜੁ ਜੋਗ ਵਰਤੈ ਵਰਤਾਰਾ
transliteration: Raag Dokh Niradokhu Hai Raaju Jog Varatai Varataaraa.
translation: Away from attachment and jealousies he has adopted rajyoga (The supreme yoga).

gurmukhi: ਮਨਸਾ ਵਾਚਾ ਕਰਮਣਾ ਮਰਮੁ ਨ ਜਾਪੈ ਅਪਰ ਅਪਾਰਾ
transliteration: Manasaa Vaachaa Karamanaa Maramu N Jaapai Apar Apaaraa.
translation: None can know the mystery of his mind, speech and actions.

gurmukhi: ਦਾਤਾ ਭੁਗਤਾ ਦੈਅਾ ਦਾਨਿ ਦੇਵਸਥਲੁ ਸਤਿਸੰਗੁ ੳੁਧਾਰਾ
transliteration: Daataa Bhougataa Daiaa Daani Dayvasadalu Satisangu Udhaaraa.
translation: He is bestower ( unattached) enjoyer, and he has created holy congregation which is equal to the abode of gods.

gurmukhi: ਸਹਜ ਸਮਾਧਿ ਅਗਾਧਿ ਬੋਧਿ ਸਤਿਗੁਰੁ ਸਚੁ ਸਵਾਰਣਹਾਰਾ
transliteration: Sahaj Samaadhi Agaadhi Bodhi Satiguru Sachaa Savaaranahaaraa.
translation: He remains absorbed in innate poise; the master of unfathomable intellect,  and being the true Guru he sets every one's disordered life in order.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰੁ ਅਮਰਹੁ ਗੁਰੁ ਰਾਮਦਾਸੁ ਜੋਤੀ ਜੋਤਿ ਜਗਾੲਿ ਜੁਹਾਰਾ
transliteration: Guru Amarahu Guru Raamadaasu Jotee Joti Jagaai Juhaaraa.
translation: From the flame of Guru Amar Das the flame of Guru Ram Das has been lighted. I salute him.

gurmukhi: ਸਬਦ ਸੁਰਤਿ ਗੁਰ ਸਿਖੁ ਹੋੲਿ ਅਨਹਦ ਬਾਣੀ ਨਿਝਰਧਾਰਾ
transliteration: Sabad Surati Gur Sikhu Hoi Anahad Baanee Nijhar Dhaaraa.
translation: Becoming disciple of Gum and merging consciousness into, word he has quaffed the eternally flowing current of the unstruck melody.

gurmukhi: ਤਖਤੁ ਬਖਤੁ ਪਰਗਟੁ ਪਾਹਾਰਾ ॥੧੪॥
transliteration: Takhatu Bakhatu Paragatu Paahaaraa ?14?
translation: Sitting on the throne of Guru, he has become manifest in the world

gurmukhi: ੧੫ ਗੁਰੂ ਰਾਮਦਾਸ
translation: Guru Ram Das

gurmukhi: ਪੀੳੂ ਦਾਦੇ ਜੇਵੇਹਾ ਪੜਦਾਦੇ ਪਰਵਾਣੁ ਪੜੋਤਾ
transliteration: Peeoo Daaday Jayvayhaa Parhadaaday Paravaanu Parhotaa.
translation: Grand father Guru Nanak, the grand son ( Guru Rain Das) has become great Like (spiritual) father Guru AmarDas, grand father Guru Angad and accepted (by sangat).

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮਤਿ ਜਾਗਿ ਜਗਾੲਿਦਾ ਕਲਿਜੁਗ ਅੰਦਰਿ ਕੌੜਾ ਸੋਤਾ
transliteration: Guramati Jaagi Jagaaidaa Kalijoug Andari Kaurhaa Sotaa.
translation: Having been awakened by Guru's instruction, he in turn awakens the dark age (Kaliyug) from deep slumber.

gurmukhi: ਦੀਨ ਦੁਨੀ ਦਾ ਥੰਮੁ ਹੁੲਿ ਭਾਰੁ ਅਥਰਬਣ ਥੰਮ੍ਹਿ ਖਲੋਤਾ
transliteration: Deen Dounee Daa Danmu Hui Bhaaru Adaraban Danmhi Khalotaa.
translation: For dharma and the world he stands like a supporting pillar.

gurmukhi: ਭੳੁਜਲ ਭੳੁ ਨ ਵਿਅਾਪੲੀ ਗੁਰ ਬੋਹਿਥ ਚੜਿ ਖਾੲਿ ਨ ਗੋਤਾ
transliteration: Bhaujalu Bhau N Viaapaee Gur Bohid Charhi Khaai N Gotaa.
translation: Whosoever has mounted the vessel of the Guru, is not scared of the world world ocean; and he is not to drown in it

gurmukhi: ਅਵਗੁਣ ਲੈ ਗੁਣ ਵਿਕਣੈ ਗੁਰ ਹਟ ਨਾਲੈ ਵਣਜ ਸਓਤਾ
transliteration: Avagoun Lai Goun Vikanai Gur Hat Naalai Vanaj Saaotaa.
translation: Here virtues are sold for evils - such is the profitable shop of the Guru.

gurmukhi: ਮਿਲਿਅਾ ਮੂਲ ਨ ਵਿਛੁੜੈ ਰਤਨ ਪਦਾਰਥ ਹਾਰੁ ਪਰੋਤਾ
transliteration: Miliaa Mooli N Vichhurhai Ratan Padaarad Haaru Parotaa.
translation: Once visited none gets separated from him who has put on the garland of the pearls of virtues.

gurmukhi: ਮੈਲਾ ਕਦੇ ਨ ਹੋਵੲੀ ਗੁਰ ਸਰਵਰਿ ਨਿਰਮਲ ਜਲ ਧੋਤਾ
transliteration: Mailaa Kaday N Hovaee Gur Saravari Niramal Jal Dhotaa.
translation: Washed himself in the pure water of the tank of the Guru's love, one never gets soiled again.

gurmukhi: ਬਾਬਾਣੈ ਕੁਲਿ ਕਵਲੁ ਅਛੋਤਾ ॥੧੫॥
transliteration: Baabanai Kuli Kavalu Achhotaa ?15?
translation: In the family of great grand father (Guru Nanak) he (Guru Ram Das) stands like a detached lotus.

gurmukhi: ੧੬ ਗੁਰੂ ਰਾਮਦਾਸ
translation: Guru Ram Das

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਮੇਲਾ ਸਚ ਦਾ ਸਚਿ ਮਿਲੈ ਸਚਿਅਾਰ ਸੰਜੋਗੀ
transliteration: Guramoukhi Maylaa Sach Daa Sachi Milai Sachiaar Sanjogee.
translation: Gurmukh longs for the glimpse of truth and the truth is abtained only by providentially meeting an adopter of the truth.

gurmukhi: ਘਰਬਾਰੀ ਪਰਵਾਰ ਵਿਚਿ ਭੋਗ ਭੁਗਤਿ ਰਾਜੇ ਰਸੁ ਭੋਗੀ
transliteration: Gharabaaree Paravaar Vichi Bhog Bhougati Raajay Rasu Bhogee.
translation: Living in the family, the gurmukh like a dutiful householder enjoys all materials and like kings tastes all delights.

gurmukhi: ਅਾਸਾ ਵਿਚਿ ਨਿਰਾਸ ਹੁੲਿ ਜੋਗ ਜੁਗਤਿ ਜੋਗੀਸਰੁ ਜੋਗੀ
transliteration: Aasaa Vichi Niraas Hui Jog Jougati Jogeesaru Jogee.
translation: He remains detached amidst all hopes and, knowing the technique of yoga, is known as the king of yogis.

gurmukhi: ਦੇਂਦਾ ਰਹੈ ਨ ਮੰਗੀਅੈ ਮਰੈ ਨ ਹੋੲਿ ਵਿਜੋਗ ਵਿਜੋਗੀ
transliteration: Dayndaa Rahai N Mangeeai Marai N Hoi Vijog Vijogee.
translation: He always bestows and begs nothing. Neither he dies nor he suffers the pangs of the separation from the Lord.

gurmukhi: ਅਾਧਿ ਬਿਅਾਧਿ ੳੁਪਾਧਿ ਹੈ ਵਾੲਿ ਪਿਤ ਕਫੁ ਰੋਗ ਅਰੋਗੀ
transliteration: Aadhi Biaadhi Oupaadhi Hai Vaai Pit Kadhu Rog Arogee.
translation: He is not troubled by pains and maladies and he remains free from the diseases of air, cough and heat.

gurmukhi: ਦੁਖੁ ਸੁਖੁ ਸਮਸਰਿ ਗੁਰਮਤੀ ਸੰਪੈ ਹਰਖ ਨ ਅਪਦਾ ਸੋਗੀ
transliteration: Doukhu Soukhu Samasari Guramatee Sanpai Harakh N Apadaa Sogee.
translation: He accepts sufferings and joys alike; wisdom of the Guru is his wealth and he is uninfluenced by joy and sorrows.

gurmukhi: ਦੇਹ ਬਿਦੇਹੀ ਲੋਗ ਅਲੋਗੀ ॥੧੬॥
transliteration: Dayh Bidayhee Log Alogee ?16?
translation: Being embodied he is yet beyond the body and while living in the world he is beyond the world.

gurmukhi: ੧੭ ਗੁਰੂ ਰਾਮਦਾਸ
translation: Guru Ram Das

gurmukhi: ਸਭਨਾ ਸਾਹਿਬੁ ੲਿਕੁ ਹੈ ਦੂਜੀ ਜਾੲਿ ਨ ਹੋੲਿ ਨ ਹੋਗੀ
transliteration: Sabhanaa Saahibu Iku Hai Doojee Jaai N Hoi N Hogee.
translation: The master of all is one; any body else has neither existed nor ever shall be in future.

gurmukhi: ਸਹਜ ਸਰੋਵਰਿ ਪਰਮਹੰਸੁ ਗੁਰਮਤਿ ਮੋਤੀ ਮਾਣਕ ਚੋਗੀ
transliteration: Sahaj Sarovari Paramahansu Guramati Motee Maanak Chogee.
translation: The creatures living in the tank of equipoise of the wisdom of Guru are known as param halls (swans of highest order)and they pick up only rubies and pearls i.e. they always adopt goodness in their life.

gurmukhi: ਖੀਰ ਨੀਰ ਜਿੳੁ ਕੂੜੁ ਸਚੁ ਤਜਣੁ ਭਜਣੁ ਗੁਰ ਗਿਅਾਨ ਅਧੋਗੀ
transliteration: Kheer Neer Jiu Koorhu Sachu Tajanu Bhajanu Gur Giaan Adhogee.
translation: Becoming authorised of the knowledge of the Guru, they separate falsehood from truth as &visas are supposed to separate water from milk.

gurmukhi: ੲਿਕ ਮਨਿ ੲਿਕੁ ਅਰਾਧਣਾ ਪਰਿਹਰਿ ਦੂਜਾ ਭਾੳੁ ਦਰੋਗੀ
transliteration: Ik Mani Iku Araadhanaa Parihari Doojaa Bhaau Darogee.
translation: Repudiating the sense of duality they adore the one Lord with single mindedness.

gurmukhi: ਸਬਦ ਸੁਰਤਿ ਲਿਵ ਸਾਧਸੰਗਿ ਸਹਜਿ ਸਮਾਧਿ ਅਗਾਧਿ ਘਰੋਗੀ
transliteration: Sabad Surati Liv Saadhasangi Sahaji Samaadhee Agaadhi Gharogee.
translation: Although house holders, they, merging their consciousness in Word, in the holy congregation remain established ineffortless concentration

gurmukhi: ਜੰਮਣੁ ਮਰਣਹੁ ਬਾਹਰੇ ਪਰੳੁਪਕਾਰ ਪਰਮਪਰ ਜੋਗੀ
transliteration: Janmanu Maranahu Baaharay Paraoupakaar Paramapar Jogee.
translation: Such perfect yogis are benevolent and free from transmigration.

gurmukhi: ਰਾਮਦਾਸ ਗੁਰ ਅਮਰ ਸਮੋਗੀ ॥੧੭॥
transliteration: Raamadaas Gur Amar Samogee ?17?
translation: Among such persons is Guru Ram Das who is fully absorbed in Guru Amar Das i.e. he is his constituent.

gurmukhi: ੧੮ ਗੁਰੂ ਅਰਜਨ ਦੇਵ ਜੀ
translation: Guru Arjan Dev

gurmukhi: ਅਲਖ ਨਿਰੰਜਨੁ ਅਾਖੀਅੈ ਅਕਲ ਅਜੋਨਿ ਅਕਾਲ ਅਪਾਰਾ
transliteration: Alakh Niranjanu Aakheeai Akal Ajoni Akaal Apaaraa.
translation: That Lord is without blemish, beyond birth, beyond time and is infinite.

gurmukhi: ਰਵਿ ਸਸਿ ਜੋਤਿ ੳੁਦੋਤ ਲੰਘਿ ਪਰਮ ਜੋਤਿ ਪਰਮੇਸਰੁ ਪਿਅਾਰਾ
transliteration: Ravi Sasi Joti Udot Laghi Param Joti Paramaysaru Piaaraa.
translation: Crossing the lights of sun and the moon, Guru Arjan Dev loves the supreme light of the Lord.

gurmukhi: ਜਗਮਗ ਜੋਤਿ ਨਿਰੰਤਰੀ ਜਗ ਜੀਵਨ ਜਗ ਜੈ ਜੈ ਕਾਰਾ
transliteration: Jag Mag Joti Nirantaree Jag Jeevan Jag Jai Jai Kaaraa.
translation: His light is ever effulgent. He is the life of the world and the whole world acclaims him.

gurmukhi: ਨਮਸਕਾਰ ਸੰਸਾਰ ਵਿਚਿ ਅਾਦਿ ਪੁਰਖ ਅਾਦੇਸੁ ੳੁਧਾਰਾ
transliteration: Namasakaar Sansaar Vichi Aadi Purakh Aadaysu Udhaaraa.
translation: All in the world salute him and he, ordained by the primal Lord, liberates one and all.

gurmukhi: ਚਾਰਿ ਵਰਨ ਛਿਅ ਦਰਸਨਾ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਮਾਰਗਿ ਸਚੁ ਅਚਾਰਾ
transliteration: Chaari Varan Chhia Darasanaan Guramoukhi Maaragi Sachu Achaaraa.
translation: Amidst the four vamas and six philosophies the way of the gurmukh is the way of adoption of truth.

gurmukhi: ਨਾਮੁ ਦਾਨੁ ੲਿਸਨਾਨੁ ਦਿੜਿ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਭਾੲਿ ਭਗਤਿ ਨਿਸਤਾਰਾ
transliteration: Naamu Daanu Isanaanu Dirhi Guramoukhi Bhaai Bhagati Nisataaraa.
translation: Adopting the remebrance of the name (of Lord), charity and ablution steadfastly and with loving devotion, he (Guru Arjan Dev) gets the devoetees across ( the world ocean).

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰੂ ਅਰਜਣੁ ਸਚੁ ਸਿਰਜਣਹਾਰਾ ॥੧੮॥
transliteration: Guru Arajanu Sachu Sirajanahaaraa ?18?
translation: Guru Arjan is the builder (of the Panth ).

gurmukhi: ੧੯ ਗੁਰੂ ਅਰਜਨ ਦੇਵ
translation: Guru Arjan Dev

gurmukhi: ਪਿੳੁ ਦਾਦਾ ਪੜਦਾਦਿਅਹੁ ਕੁਲ ਦੀਪਕੁ ਅਜਰਾਵਰ ਨਤਾ
transliteration: Piu Daadaa Parhadaadiahu Kul Deepaku Ajaraavar Nataa.
translation: Guru Arjan Dev is the lamp of the line of his father, grand father and great grand father.

gurmukhi: ਤਖਤੁ ਬਖਤੁ ਲੈ ਮਲਿਅਾ ਸਬਦ ਸੁਰਤਿ ਵਾਪਾਰਿ ਸਪਤਾ
transliteration: Takhatu Bakhatu Lai Maliaa Sabad Surati Vaapaari Sapataa.
translation: Having merged his consciousness into Word he in a dignified way has undertaken the task (of Guruship) and being blest st one, has assumed the authority of the throne (of the Lord).

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਬਾਣੀ ਭੰਡਾਰੁ ਭਰਿ ਕੀਰਤਨੁ ਕਥਾ ਰਹੈ ਰੰਗ ਰਤਾ
transliteration: Gurabaanee Bhandaaru Bhari Keeratanu Kadaa Rahai Rang Rataa.
translation: He is the storehouse of gurbdni (divine hymns) and remains absorbed in the eulogization (of the Lord).

gurmukhi: ਧੁਨਿ ਅਨਹਦਿ ਨਿਝਰੁ ਝਰੈ ਪੂਰਨ ਪ੍ਰੇਮਿ ਅਮਿਓ ਰਸ ਮਤਾ
transliteration: Dhouni Anahadi Nijharu Jharai Pooran Praymi Amiao Ras Mataa.
translation: He allows the fountain of unstruck melody flow unabated and remains immersed in the nectar of perfect love.

gurmukhi: ਸਾਧਸੰਗਤਿ ਹੈ ਗੁਰੁ ਸਭਾ ਰਤਨ ਪਦਾਰਥ ਵਣਜ ਸਹਤਾ
transliteration: Saadhasangati Hai Guru Sabhaa Ratan Padaarad Vanaj Sahataa.
translation: When the court of Guru assumes the form of holy congregation, the exchange of jewels and gems of wisdom takes place

gurmukhi: ਸਚ ਨੀਸਾਣੁ ਦੀਬਾਣੁ ਸਚੁ ਸਚੁ ਤਾਣੁ ਸਚੁ ਮਾਣੁ ਮਹਤਾ
transliteration: Sachu Neesaanu Deebaanu Sachu Sachu Taanu Sachu Maanu Mahataa.
translation: The true court of Guru Arjan Dev is the true mark (of grandeur) and he has attained the true honour and greatness

gurmukhi: ਅਬਚਲੁ ਰਾਜੁ ਹੋਅਾ ਸਣਖਤਾ ॥੧੯॥
transliteration: Abachalu Raaju Hoaa Sanakhataa ?19?
translation: The kingdom of knowledgeable (Guru Arjan Dev) is immutable.

gurmukhi: ੨੦ ਗੁਰੂ ਅਰਜਨ ਦੇਵ ਜੀ
translation: Guru Arjan Dev

gurmukhi: ਚਾਰੇ ਚਕ ਨਿਵਾੲਿਓਨੁ ਸਿਖ ਸੰਗਤਿ ਅਾਵੈ ਅਗਣਤਾ
transliteration: Chaaray Chak Nivaaiaonu Sikh Sangati Aavai Aganataa.
translation: He has conquered all the four directions and the Sikh devotees come to him in countless number.

gurmukhi: ਲੰਗਰੁ ਚਲੈ ਗੁਰ ਸਬਦਿ ਪੂਰੇ ਪੂਰੀ ਬਣੀ ਬਣਤਾ
transliteration: Lagaru Chalai Gur Sabadi Pooray Pooree Banee Banataa.
translation: The free kitchen (latigar) wherein the word of the Guru is served runs unabated there and this is the perfect creation(arrangement) of the perfect Guru.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਛਤ੍ਰ ਨਿਰੰਜਨੀ ਪੂਰਨ ਬ੍ਹਮ ਪਰਮਪਦ ਮਤਾ
transliteration: Guramoukhi Chhatr Niranjanee Pooran Braham Paramapad Pataa.
translation: Under the canopy of the Lord, the gurmukhs attain the supreme state bestowed by the perfect Lord.

gurmukhi: ਵੇਦ ਕਤੇਬ ਅਗੋਚਰਾ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਸਬਦੁ ਸਾਧ ਸੰਗੁ ਸਤਾ
transliteration: Vayd Katayb Agocharaa Guramoukhi Sabadu Saadh Sangu Sataa.
translation: In the holy congregation, the. Word Brahm, which is beyond the Vedas and the Ketebas , is attained by gurmukhs.

gurmukhi: ਮਾੲਿਅਾ ਵਿਚਿ ੳੁਦਾਸੁ ਕਰਿ ਗੁਰੁ ਸਿਖ ਜਨਕ ਅਸੰਖ ਭਗਤਾ
transliteration: Maaiaa Vichi Udaasu Kari Guru Sikh Janak Asankh Bhagataa.
translation: The Guru has created myriad Janak-like devotees who remain detached amidst maya.

gurmukhi: ਕੁਦਰਤਿ ਕੀਮ ਨ ਜਾਣੀਅੈ ਅਕਥ ਕਥਾ ਅਬਿਗਤ ਅਬਿਗਤਾ
transliteration: Kudarati Keem N Jaaneeai Akad Kadaa Abigat Abigataa.
translation: The mystery of the power of His creation cannot be known and ineffable is the story of that unmanifest (Lord) .

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਸੁਖ ਫਲੁ ਸਹਜ ਸੁਗਤਾ ॥੨੦॥
transliteration: Guramoukhi Soukh Phalu Sahaj Jougataa ?20?
translation: The gurmukhs receive their pleasure fruit without any effort.

gurmukhi: ੨੧ ਗੁਰੂ ਅਰਜਨ ਜੀ ਤੋਂ ਗੁਰੂ ਹਰਿਗੋਬਿੰਦ
translation: Guru Hargobind from Guru Arjan Dev

gurmukhi: ਹਰਖਹੁ ਸੋਗਹੁ ਬਾਹਰਾ ਹਰਣ ਭਰਣ ਸਮਰਥੁ ਸਰੰਦਾ
transliteration: Harakhahu Sogahu Baaharaa Haran Bharan Samaradu Sarandaa.
translation: Beyond pleasures and sorrows he is creator, sustainer and destroyer.

gurmukhi: ਰਸ ਕਸ ਰੂਪ ਨ ਰੇਖਿ ਵਿਚਿ ਰਾਗ ਰੰਗ ਨਿਰਲੇਪੁ ਰਹੰਦਾ
transliteration: Ras Kas Roop N Raykhi Vichi Raag Rang Niralaypu Rahandaa.
translation: He is away from enjoyments, repulsions, forms and even being amidst festivities, he remains detached and stabilized.

gurmukhi: ਗੋਸਟਿ ਗਿਅਾਨ ਅਗੋਚਰਾ ਬੁਧਿ ਬਲ ਬਚਨ ਬਿਬੇਕ ਨ ਛੰਦਾ
transliteration: Gosati Giaan Agocharaa Budhi Bal Bachan Bibayk N Chhandaa.
translation: Unapproable through discussions, he is beyond the powers of intellect, speech; wisdom and praise.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰ ਗੋਵਿੰਦ ਗੋਵਿੰਦੁ ਗੁਰੁ ਹਰਿਗੋਵਿੰਦੁ ਸਦਾ ਵਿਗਸੰਦਾ
transliteration: Gur Govindu Govindu Guru Harigovindu Sadaa Vigasandaa.
translation: Accepting Guru,(Arjan Dev) as God and God as Guru, Hargobind (the Guru)remains ever elated.

gurmukhi: ਅਚਰਜ ਨੋ ਅਚਰਜ ਮਿਲੈ ਵਿਸਮਾਦੈ ਵਿਸਮਾਦ ਮਿਲੰਦਾ
transliteration: Acharaj No Acharaj Milai Visamaadai Visamaad Miladaa.
translation: Being full of wonder he is absorbed in the supreme :Wonder and thus being awe inspired he remains immersed in supreme rapture , rapture.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਮਾਰਗਿ ਚਲਣਾ ਖੰਡੇ ਧਾਰ ਕਾਰ ਨਿਬਹੰਦਾ
transliteration: Guramoukhi Maaragi Chalanaa Khanday Dhaar Kaar Nibahandaa.
translation: Moving on the way of gurmukhs is like treading on the edge of  sword.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰ ਸਿਖਿ ਲੈ ਗੁਰਸਿਖੁ ਚਲੰਦਾ ॥੨੧॥
transliteration: Gur Sikh Lai Gur Sikhu Chaladaa ?21?
translation: Accepting the teachings of the Guru, the disciple adopts  them in his life.

gurmukhi: ੨੨ ਗੁਰੂ ਦੀ ਮਹਿਂਮਾਂ, ਸਿੱਖ ਨੂੰ ੳੁਪਦੇਸ਼
translation: Glory of the Guru, teaching for the Sikh  ,

gurmukhi: ਹੰਸਹੁ ਹੰਸ ਗਿਅਾਨੁ ਕਰਿ ਦੁਧੈ ਵਿਚਹੁ ਕਢੈ ਪਾਣੀ
transliteration: Hansahu Hans Giaanu Kari Dudhai Vichahu Kaddhai Paanee.
translation: The gurmukhs are those swans who on the basis of their knowledge sift water (falsehood) from milk (truth).

gurmukhi: ਕਛਹੁ ਕਛੁ ਧਿਅਾਨ ਧਰਿ ਲਹਰਿ ਨ ਵਿਅਾਪੈ ਘੁੰਮਣਵਾਣੀ
transliteration: Kachhahu Kachhu Dhiaani Dhari Lahari N Viaapai Ghounmanavaanee.
translation: Among turtles, they are such ones who remain uninfluenced by waves and whirlpools.

gurmukhi: ਕੂੰਜਹੁ ਕੂੰਜੁ ਵਖਾਣੀਅੈ ਸਿਮਰਣੁ ਕਰਿ ੳੁਡੈ ਅਸਮਾਣੀ
transliteration: Koonjahu Koonju Vakhaaneeai Simaranu Kari Udai Asamaanee.
translation: They are like siberian cranes who go on remembering the Lord while flying high.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਪਰਚੈ ਗੁਰ ਜਾਣੀਅੈ ਗਿਅਾਨਿ ਧਿਅਾਨਿ ਸਿਮਰਣਿ ਗੁਰਬਾਣੀ
transliteration: Guraparachai Gur Jaaneeai Giaani Dhiaani Simarani Gurabaanee.
translation: Only by loving the Guru, the Sikh knows, understands and learns the knowledge, meditation and Gurbani, the holy hymns.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰ ਸਿਖ ਲੈ ਗੁਰਸਿਖ ਹੋੲਿ ਸਾਧਸੰਗਤਿ ਜਗ ਅੰਦਰਿ ਜਾਣੀ
transliteration: Gur Sikh Lai Gurasikh Honi Saadhasangati Jag Andari Jaanee.
translation: Having adopted the teachings of the Guru, the Sikhs become gursikhs, the Sikhs of the Guru, and join the holy congregation wherever they find it.

gurmukhi: ਪੈਰੀ ਪੈ ਪਾਖਾਕ ਹੋੲਿ ਗਰਬੁ ਨਿਵਾਰਿ ਗਰੀਬੀ ਅਾਣੀ
transliteration: Pairee Pai Paakhaak Hoi Garabu Nivaari Gareebee Aanee.
translation: The humility could be cultivated only by bowing at the feet, becoming the dust of feet of the Guru and by deleting ego from the self.

gurmukhi: ਪੀ ਚਰਣੋਦਕੁ ਅੰਮ੍ਰਿਤ ਵਾਣੀ ॥੨੨॥
transliteration: Pee Charanodaku Anmrit Vaanee ?22?
translation: Only such persons take feet-wash of the Guru and their speech becomes nectar (for others).

gurmukhi: ੨੩ ਗੁਰੂ ਅਰਜਨ ਜੀ ਦੀ ਜੋਤੀਜੋਤ
translation: Mingling of the light of Guru Arjan Dev with the eternal light

gurmukhi: ਰਹਿਦੇ ਗੁਰੁ ਦਰੀਅਾੳੁ ਵਿਚਿ ਮੀਨ ਕੁਲੀਨ ਹੇਤੁ ਨਿਰਬਾਣੀ
transliteration: Rahiday Guru Dareeaau Vichi Meen Kuleen Haytu Nirabaanee.
translation: Liberating the soul from the body, Guru (Arjan Dev) stabilized himself in the water of river as the fish remains in water.

gurmukhi: ਦਰਸਨੁ ਦੇਖਿ ਪਤੰਗ ਜਿੳੁ ਜੋਤੀ ਅੰਦਰਿ ਜੋਤਿ ਸਮਾਣੀ
transliteration: Darasanu Daykhi Patang Jiu Jotee Andari Joti Samaanee.
translation: As the moth rows itself into the flame, his light mingled with light of the Lord.

gurmukhi: ਸਬਦੁ ਸੁਰਤਿ ਲਿਵ ਮਿਰਗ ਜਿੳੁ ਭੀੜ ਪੲੀ ਚਿਤਿ ਅਵਰੁ ਨ ਅਾਣੀ
transliteration: Sabadu Surati Liv Mirag Jiu Bheerh Paee Chiti Avaru N Aanee.
translation: Caring of for life, as the deer keeps its consciousness concentrated when in peril, the Guru also, when undergoing suffering kept none else except the Lord in is' consciousness.

gurmukhi: ਚਰਣ ਕਵਲ ਮਿਲਿ ਭਵਰ ਜਿੳੁ ਸੁਖ ਸੰਪਟ ਵਿਚਿ ਰੈਣਿ ਵਿਹਾਣੀ
transliteration: Charan Kaval Mili Bhavar Jiu Soukh Sanpat Vichi Raini Vihaanee.
translation: As the black bee remains enrapt in the petals of flower • enjoy fragrance, the Guru also spent night of suffering by keeping joyfully s concentration on the feet of Lord.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰੁ ੳੁਪਦੇਸੁ ਨ ਵਿਸਰੈ ਬਾਬੀਹੇ ਜਿੳੁ ਅਾਖ ਵਖਾਣੀ
transliteration: Guru Oupadaysu N Visarai Baabeehay Jiu Aakh Vakhaanee.
translation: The Guru like a rainbird spoke to his isciples that the teachings of the Guru should not be forgotten.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਸੁਖ ਫਲੁ ਪਿਰਮ ਰਸੁ ਸਹਜ ਸਮਾਧਿ ਸਾਧ ਸੰਗਿ ਜਾਣੀ
transliteration: Guramoukhi Soukh Phalu Piram Rasu Sahaj Samaadhi Saadh Sangi Jaanee.
translation: The pleasure it of the Gurmukh (Guru Arjan Dev) is the delight of love and he accepts the holy congregation as the natural state of meditation.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰ ਅਰਜਨ ਵਿਟਹੁ ਕੁਰਬਾਣੀ ॥੨੩॥
transliteration: Gur Arajan Vitahu Kurabaanee ?23?
translation: I am sacrifice untoGu ru Arjan Dev.

gurmukhi: ੨੪ ਗੁਰੂ ਹਰਗੋਬਿੰਦ
translation: Guru Hargobind

gurmukhi: ਪਾਰਬ੍ਹਮ ਪੂਰਨ ਬ੍ਹਮਿ ਸਤਿਗੁਰ ਅਾਪੇ ਅਾਪੁ ੳੁਪਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Paarabrahamu Pooran Brahami Satigur Aapay Aapu Oupaaiaa.
translation: The true Guru has been created in the form of perfect Brahm by the transcendent Brahm. Guru is God and God is the Guru; two names are of the same supreme reality.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰੁ ਗੋਬਿੰਦੁ ਗੋਵਿੰਦੁ ਗੁਰੁ ਜੋਤਿ ੲਿਕ ਦੁੲਿ ਨਾਵ ਧਰਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Guru Gobindu Govindu Guru Joti Ik Dui Naav Dharaaiaa.
translation: The son for the father and the father for the son created wonder by receiving the wondrous Word .

gurmukhi: ਪੁਤੁ ਪਿਅਹੁ ਪਿੳੁ ਪੁਤ ਤੇ ਵਿਸਮਾਦਹੁ ਵਿਸਮਾਦੁ ਸੁਣਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Poutu Piahu Piu Pout Tay Visamaadahu Visamaadu Sounaaiaa.
translation: A wonderful beauty has been created in the action of tree becoming fruit and fruit the tree.

gurmukhi: ਬਿਰਖਹੁ ਫਲੁ ਫਲ ਤੇ ਬਿਰਖੁ ਅਾਚਰਜਹੁ ਅਾਚਰਜੁ ਸੁਹਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Birakhahu Phalu Phal Tay Birakhu Aacharajahu Aacharaju Suhaaiaa.
translation: From the two banks of a river its true extent cannot be understood simply by saying that the one is far and the other near bank.

gurmukhi: ਨਦੀ ਕਿਨਾਰੇ ਅਾਖੀਅਨਿ ਪੁਛੇ ਪਾਰਾਵਾਰੁ ਨ ਪਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Nadee Kinaaray Aakheeani Pouchhay Paaravaaru N Paaiaa.
translation: Guru Arjan Dev and Guru Hargobind are in fact one and the same.

gurmukhi: ਹੋਰਨਿ ਅਲਖੁ ਨ ਲਖੀਅੈ ਗੁਰੁ ਚੇਲੇ ਮਿਲਿ ਅਲਖੁ ਲਖਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Horani Alakhu N Lakheeai Guru Chaylay Mili Alakhu Lakhaaiaa.
translation: None else can perceive the imperceptible Lord but the disciple (Hargobind) having met the Guru (Arjan Dev) has visualised the imperceptible Lord.

gurmukhi: ਹਰਿ ਗੋਵਿੰਦੁ ਗੁਰੂ ਗੁਰੁ ਭਾੲਿਅਾ ॥੨੪॥
transliteration: Hari Govindu Guroo Guru Bhaaiaa ?24?
translation: Guru Hargobind is dear to the Lord who is the Guru of the Gurus.

gurmukhi: ੨੫ ਖ਼ਸ਼ਟ ਗੁਰੂ ਵਰਣਨ
translation: Description of the sixth Guru

gurmukhi: ਨਿਰੰਕਾਰੁ ਨਾਨਕ ਦੇੳੁ ਨਿਰੰਕਾਰਿ ਅਾਕਾਰ ਬਣਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Nirankaar Naanak Dayu Nirankaari Aakaar Banaaiaa.
translation: The formless Lord assumed the form of Guru Nanak Dev who is second all forms.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰੁ ਅੰਗਦੁ ਗੁਰੁ ਅੰਗ ਤੇ ਗੰਗਹੁ ਜਾਣੁ ਤਰੰਗ ੳੁਠਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Guru Angadu Guru Ang Tay Gangahu Jaanu Tarang Outdaaiaa.
translation: In turn, he created Afigad from his limbs as the waves e created by Ganges.

gurmukhi: ਅਮਰਦਾਸੁ ਗੁਰੁ ਅੰਗਦਹੁ ਜੋਤਿ ਸਰੂਪ ਚਲਤੁ ਵਰਤਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Amaradaasu Guru Angadahu Joti Saroop Chalatu Varataaiaa.
translation: From Guru Angad came Guru Amar Das and the miracle of the transference of the light was seen by one and all.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰੁ ਅਮਰਹੁ ਗੁਰੁ ਰਾਮਦਾਸੁ ਅਨਹਦ ਨਾਦਹੁ ਸਬਦੁ ਸੁਣਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Guru Amarahu Guru Raamadaasu Anahad Naadahu Sabadu Sounaaiaa.
translation: From. Guru ar Das Rim Das came into being in such a way as if the Word was ated from the unstruck sounds.

gurmukhi: ਰਾਮਦਾਸਹੁ ਅਰਜਨੁ ਗੁਰੂ ਦਰਸਨੁ ਦਰਪਨਿ ਵਿਚਿ ਦਿਖਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Raamadaasahu Arajanu Guroo Darasanu Darapani Vichi Dikhaaiaa.
translation: Guru Arjan Dev by Guru Ram 'Ws was ated as if he is the image of the latter in the mirror.

gurmukhi: ਹਰਿ ਗੋਬਿੰਦ ਗੁਰ ਅਰਜਨਹੁ ਗੁਰੁ ਗੋਬਿੰਦੁ ਨਾੳੁਂ ਸਦਵਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Harigobind Gur Arajanahu Guru Gobind Naau Sadavaaiaa.
translation: Being created by Guru Arjan Dev, Guru Hargobind made himself famous as the form of the Lord.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੂਰਤਿ ਗੁਰ ਸਬਦੁ ਹੈ ਸਾਧਸੰਗਤਿ ਵਿਚਿ ਪਰਗਟੀ ਅਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Gur Moorati Gur Sabadu Hai Saadhasangati Vichi Paragatee Aaiaa.
translation: In fact the physical body of the Guru is 'Word' of the Guru which comes perceptible only in the form of holy congregation.

gurmukhi: ਪੈਰੀ ਪਾੲਿ ਸਭ ਜਗਤੁ ਤਰਾੲਿਅਾ ॥੨੫॥੨੪॥
transliteration: Pairee Paai Sabh Jagatu Taraaiaa ?25?24?chauveeha?
translation: Thus, the true liberated the whole world making people bow at the Lord's feet.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮਤਿ ਸਤਿ ਕਰਿ ਚੰਚਲ ਅਚਲ ਭੲੇ ਮਹਾ ਮਲ ਮੂਤ੍ਰ ਧਾਰੀ ਨਿਰਮਲ ਕੀਨੇ ਹੈ
transliteration: Gurmati Sati Kari Chanchal Achal Bhaay , Mahaa Mal Mootr Dhaaree Niramal Keenay Hai ?
translation: Those frolicsome persons who toil on the name of the Lord with devotion and love become peaceful and tranquil. Those who are filled with dross become neat and clean.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮਤਿ ਸਤਿ ਕਰਿ ਜੋਨਿ ਕੈ ਅਜੋਨਿ ਭੲੇ ਕਾਲ ਸੈ ਅਕਾਲ ਕੈ ਅਮਰ ਪਦ ਦੀਨੇ ਹੈ
transliteration: Gurmati Sati Kari Joni Kai Ajoni Bhaay , Kaal Sai Akaal Kai Amar Pad Deenay Hai ?
translation: Those who practiced the consecration of True Guru saved themselves from the repeated births in the life of various species and achieved immortality.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮਤਿ ਸਤਿ ਕਰਿ ਹੳੁਮੈ ਖੋੲਿ ਹੋੲਿ ਰੇਨ ਤ੍ਰਿਕੁਟੀ ਤ੍ਰਿਬੇਨੀ ਪਾਰਿ ਅਾਪਾ ਅਾਪ ਚੀਨੇ ਹੈ
transliteration: Gurmati Sati Kari Haoumai Khoi Hoi Rayna , Trikoutee Tribaynee Paari Aapaa Aap Cheenay Hai ?
translation: Those who toil on the Naam Simran of the Lord with full devotion and love, become humble by renouncing ego and crossing all hurdles merge into Him.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮਤਿ ਸਤਿ ਕਰਿ ਬਰਨ ਅਬਰਨ ਭੲੇ ਭੈ ਭ੍ਰਮ ਨਿਵਾਰਿ ਡਾਰਿ ਨਿਰਭੈ ਕੈ ਲੀਨੇ ਹੈ ॥੨੪॥
transliteration: Gurmati Sati Kari Baran Abaran Bhaay , Bhai Bhram Nivaari Daari Nirabhai Kai Leenay Hai ?24?
translation: They are free from caste, creed, race and colour-based social inequalities and becoming fearless merge with the Fearless Lord. (24)
